text: The Bahá'í World Centre is the headquarters of the Bahá'í Faith. It is located in Haifa, Israel on Mount Carmel. The Bahá'í World Centre includes the World Bahá'í Archive, Universal House of Justice of the Baha'i Faith, International Center for advisors, and the Scripture Study Center. There are many Baha'i believers in Haifa and Acre. == Other websites == *www.bahai.org - Official website * * *Photos - The Bahá'í Gardens in Haifa: the Shrine of the Bab Terraces & Gardens * Category:Bahá'í Faith Category:Buildings and structures in Haifa Category:Religion in Israel Category:Religious buildings
title: Bahá'í World Centre
